title: 원인·결과 연결 심화
description: 원인과 결과의 관계를 다양한 고급 표현으로 연결하여 논리적 설득력을 강화하는 방법을 연습합니다.
examples: Owing to the exceptional performance, the team received recognition.
As a result of careful planning, the project was completed ahead of schedule.
The success stems from the dedication of all team members.
learning_points: 고급 원인-결과 연결 표현을 통한 논리적 설득력 강화

sentences.kr: 뛰어난 성과 덕분에 팀이 인정을 받았습니다.
sentences.en: Owing to the exceptional performance, the team received recognition.

sentences.kr: 신중한 계획의 결과로 프로젝트가 예정보다 앞서 완료되었습니다.
sentences.en: As a result of careful planning, the project was completed ahead of schedule.
The success stems from the dedication of all team members.

sentences.kr: 지속적인 혁신으로 인해 회사는 시장을 선도하고 있습니다.
sentences.en: Due to continuous innovation, the company is leading the market.
As a consequence of effective communication, conflicts were resolved.

sentences.kr: 품질 향상이 고객 만족도 증가를 가져왔습니다.
sentences.en: Quality improvement has brought about increased customer satisfaction.

sentences.kr: 경제적 요인으로 인해 계획을 수정해야 했습니다.
sentences.en: On account of economic factors, the plan had to be modified.
Aggressive marketing has resulted in increased sales volume.
